snippet.title: Meme Lordz - Official Trailer - Blockchain RPG
snippet.description:
#NftGaming #PlayToEarn #MemeToEarn #BlockchainGame #FreeToPlay #CryptoGame #RPG

Play the game here: https://beta.memelordz.io/

About Meme Lordz

Meme Lordz is the world’s first free-to-play, meme-to-earn NFT game. Powered by  Unity, Binance Smart Chain & Chain Link VRF, our top-down Pokemon-esque role-playing game (RPG) allows players to explore a vibrant open world environment that is sprinkled with a rich 80+ hour storyline, deep lore & pure comedic gold.  Meme Lordz enables players to earn crypto by minting blockchain non-fungible tokens (NFTs), which represent the character they capture (Meme Lord). Players can also earn BNB & $Lordz when our upcoming official play to earn system comes online. 

Join the Meme Lordz Community

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MemeLordzRPG
Telegram: https://t.me/memelordzgame
Discord: https://discord.com/channels/884910542546944132/884910542546944140
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MemeLordzGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/memelordzgame/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJtTHl68wkwzi9axEw_ibzQ/featured
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/memelordz
